name: Fallen Cube
description:
DescriptionFallen Cube is a puzzle game where you should in any way deliver the red cube (or cubes) to the destination, which is green (if one cube) or purple (if two cubes) marker.
You will be prevented by other cubes of different types. You will be given several removal points, after spending which you will be able to clear the way for the red cube to the marker.Features
  • 90 levels
  • relaxing background soundtrack
  • pretty good timekiller
  • comfortable graphics
Controls"Left Mouse Button" - For removing blocks
"Spacebar" - Restart level
